t: How to Get Free Samples on Amazon?
s: Both Prime and non-Prime Amazon customers can sign up for the sampling program. You need an Amazon account to enroll and pick sample categories you're interested in trying. Opting into the program's sampling preferences makes your account visible so brands can choose recipients.

t: Amazon Offers Product Sampling Program To Brands, Rooted In Machine Learning
s: January 11, 2019 - Maybelline and Folgers are two brands that have been sending product samples out to customers, according to Axios. Amazon customers have reported receiving product samples in recent months, separate to Amazon’s Prime Sample program, where customers pay to receive a box of product samples.
